title: Fix type error: window.showDirectoryPicker typing in chrome extension
description: tsc fails in @fanslib/apps/chrome-extension/src/lib/fileSystem.ts because 'showDirectoryPicker' is not recognized on window. Add appropriate DOM lib typing or guard the File System Access API to restore typecheck.

title: Add the logo in full and small to the ui component overview. Make "lib" readable again. Adjust the initial state so that without javascript enabled, the logo still looks good (and it doesn't move into place when loading the page)
